EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - KC
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Monday at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place Monday in Kansas City.
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Kansas City Monday, June 13th, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/kansascity?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pivotal-roadshow-2016-KC]]>
Location The Gallery <[[http://thegalleryeventspace.com/]]> 61 E 14th Street Kansas City, MO Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/The+Gallery+Event+Space/@39.0970016,-94.5849632,17z/data=!3m2!4b1!5s0x87c0f067f49e87d9:0x7edf0a3a0384adf5!4m5!3m4!1s0x87c0f0678c58bf57:0x2f20c057f671625e!8m2!3d39.0970016!4d-94.5827692]]>
Questions? Contact Kathryn Efird at kefird@pivotal.io <[[mailto:kefird@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you!
The Pivotal Team
